angle-tooltip:
The angle that the baseline of the label makes with 
the horizontal, in degrees, measured counterclockwise.
api-key-tooltip-wallhaven: If an API key is provided, searches will be preformed with that user's browsing settings and default filters from wallhaven.cc. W/o API key you'll always see SFW content.
atleast-tooltip: Minimum screen resolution. Set your biggest display dimesions here.
backlight-device-tooltip:
Backlight device path (for 'light')
or name (for 'brightnessctl')
or I2C bus number (for 'ddcutil').
Use 'light -L' or 'brightnessctl -l'
or 'ddcutil --help' to
check available devices.
LEAVE BLANK IF EVERYTHING WORKS
button-name-tooltip:
Attention! Renaming an existing
button will create a new one.
check-interval-tooltip:
Specifies how often (in seconds)
to ask for weather data 
(e.g. 1800 for half an hour).
clock-date-format-tooltip: Allow using 'date' format for tooltip text.
controls-window-width-tooltip: Controls window width in pixels; leave 0 for auto.
css-name-tooltip: Determines css #id to use for this item.
custom-labels-tooltip:
One single label or new line-separated multiple custom labels
for each workspace number specified above.
custom-location-name-tooltip:
If you don't like the location name returned from geocoder, 
you may define your own label here.
data-path-tooltip:
Leave blank for default '/home/$USER/.local/share/nwg-panel/calendar.json'.
Or you may use e.g. '~/Dropbox/calendar.json' to sync data between your machines.
enable-exclusive-zone-tooltip: Determines whether the panel is to put other windows away.
executor-name-tooltip:
Attention! Renaming an existing executor
will create a new one.
hide-show-signal-tooltip: Hide/show panel on an RT signal. Use `pkill -f -<signal_number> nwg-panel` in a key binding.
homogeneous-tooltip: Sets equal columns width be default if 'Modules center' not empty.
label: Label
layer-tooltip:
For typical panels use 'bottom' or 'top'.
Horizontal and vertical panels should not
be placed on the same layer.
name: Name
processes-label-tooltip: Processes label in the Controls menu
processes-polling-rate-tooltip: Interval for checking data on system processes by the nwg-processes tool. Default: 2000 ms. Set higher values for slower machines. Set 0 to stop refreshing.
processes-tooltip: Determines if to display the system processes menu entry.
ratios-tooltip: Comma-separated list of allowed screen aspect ratios, e.g. 16x9,16x10
readme-tooltip: Determines if to display the common README browser menu entry.
readme-label-tooltip: README label in the Controls menu
refresh-interval-tooltip:
Refresh interval in seconds.
Set 0 for no auto-refresh.
restart-delay-tooltip: If, after turning a display off and back on, panels don't appear on it, it may mean the display responds too slowly. Try increasing this value.
run-if-output-exist-tooltip: The panel will be launched only if all these outputs are connected. Comma-separated list of output names.
run-if-output-absent-tooltip: The panel will be launched only if all these outputs are disconnected. Comma-separated list of output names.
run-through-compositor-tooltip: Determines if to execute programs via 'swaymsg exec <cmd>' on sway and 'hyprctl dispatch exec <cmd>' on Hyprland
script-tooltip:
Script to execute: should return 
an icon name or path and a label 
in 1 or 2 lines of text. See Wiki 
for details.
show-default-tooltip: Determines if to show the module if none mode other than default selected.
single-output-tooltip:
This option allows to use separate Scratchpad module instances
on multiple panels / various displays, preferrably next to the
SwayTaskbar module. It determines if to show  tasks moved to the 
scratchpad from this output only, or all tasks. For this to take effect,
you need to assingn your panels to the outputs, and move tasks to the
scratchpad with the SwayTaskbar context menu only. Whatever you
move the other way, will show up on all Scratchpad module instances.
slider-height-tooltip: Window height in pixels. Leave 0 for auto.
slider-width-tooltip: Window width in pixels. Leave 0 for auto.
step-size-tooltip:
Value of increment/decrement using scroll wheel.
Set 0 to disable.
tags-tooltip: Tags separated by comma. Images tagged with all given tags will be searched.
values-in-widget-tooltip: Show value in the panel widget
wallpaper-refresh-tooltip: Determines how often (in minutes) to reload wallpaper. Set 0 to disable reload.
workspaces-to-show-tooltip: Space-separated numbers of workspaces to show.
workspaces-tooltip:
Space-separated numbers of workspaces 
you defined in sway config. We'll build the 
context menu out of them.
